name: Unsplurge
tag_list: ios, apps, financial, goals, consumer, social-network
overview:
Skip a little, save a lot. Unsplurge is the platform that will make change the way we think about our money. Saving can be fun and social.

Unsplurge is building an app to set financial goals and save for them in a unique and fun way. The app will also be the gateway to a community of savvy savers and spenders who are proud to share their goals and savings.

How It Works

  • Set a goal to strive for - it may be a splurge purcase you’ve been dreaming about, a savings target, or a donation to a charity that matters to you
  • Give yourself credit every time you say NO to impulse purchases or other wasteful spending that you wouldn’t appreciate anyway
  • Watch the savings add up until you reach your goal
  • Share your goals and unsplurge stories with a community of savvy savers
